text: @realDonaldTrump Can you give us a breakdown for your Black voter's support for you now?!?! I'm just curious because you were bragging about how "high" it's been for a while now. I haven't heard you mentioned it since the COVID-19 outbreak and nothing at all since the Minneapolis PD MURDER.
